sense.gloss: to go to bed, to go to sleep, to fall asleep
to be laid up (with a cold), to be ill in bed

sdata.j: ↑実↑↓み↓も↑結↑↓むす↓ぶが、↑挿↑↓さ↓し↑木↑↓き↓でも↑根付↑↓|ねつ↓く|らしい？
sdata.e: It bears fruit, but it seems it may even set root from cuttings?

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑気↑↓き↓がかりなことがたくさんあって、↑夜↑↓よる↓↑寝付↑↓|ねつ↓く|のに↑苦労↑↓くろう↓している。
sdata.e: I've had a lot on my mind recently and have had trouble falling asleep at night.
